== Description ==
Start preview theme output buffer. 

Will only perform task if the user has permissions and '<tt>template</tt>' and '<tt>preview</tt>' query variables exist. Will add '<tt>stylesheet</tt>' filter if '<tt>stylesheet</tt>' query variable exists. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php preview_theme() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
